name: Maxel
tagline: Native Download Accelerator for Mac OS X
body:
# Maxel 2
Maxel will be replaced with Maxel2, a native Cocoa app. It will be distributed on the App Store after an open Beta.

Maxel 2 addresses issues with Maxel 1, such as:

* The ability to pause downloads
* Lower CPU usage
* View multiple downloads
* Better UI
* Smaller binary

#Features
Maxel downloads files with many connections, allowing you to saturate your bandwidth. It supports multiple concurrent downloads as well.

#Requirements
Mac OS 10.9+

#Usage
Enter the urls, number of connections, and download destination.  Download.

# Feature Requests
You can request features and report bugs here: https://github.com/unregistered/Maxel/issues
